EmailTemplate.subject: Make Your Workspace A Healthy Space
EmailTemplate.textOnly: View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Create Your Healthy Workspace <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-ergo-in-the-workplace.aspx?cmp=EBBSBLOGMAY19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Health and wellness in the workplace are very important for employees and the business. Find out how ergonomics can improve your workspace. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z0bsdm?cmp=EBBDCLEARANCEEN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Learn More <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-ergo-in-the-workplace.aspx?cmp=EBBSBLOGMAY19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> I Want to Shop <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=EBBSMAY19EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
